mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT A.CARLINE_CD , SUM(1) AS CNT FROM SA_0121T A WHERE A.NCAR_DSTIN_CD = 'N' -- 신차 AND A.ORD_DLR_CD = #{sDlrCd} -- 딜러코드
AND A.CARLINE_CD = #{sCarlineCd}
AND A.MODEL_CD = #{sModelCd}
AND A.VIN_NO like '%'||#{sVinNo}||'%'
AND A.CAR_STAT_CD = '60'
AND A.CAR_STAT_CD = '50'
AND A.CAR_STAT_CD in ('50', '60')
GROUP BY A.CARLINE_CD /* GROUP BY A.CAR_STAT_CD, A.CARLINE_CD, A.MODEL_CD, A.OCN_CD, A.EXT_COLOR_CD, A.INT_COLOR_CD */ )
